citations.narrative:
***The roof of the camel shelter has fallen in on one side. The structure is not structurally sound. The roof shall be
repaired to protect the camels from injury. Correct by April 26, 2014
The inspection and exit briefing conducted with the owner.

narrative:
3.125(a)
FACILITIES, GENERAL.   
***The roof of the camel shelter has fallen in on one side.  The structure is not structurally sound.  The roof shall be
repaired to protect the camels from injury.  Correct by April 26, 2014
The inspection and exit briefing conducted with the owner.
